nodes.text: The Wild Star was a modified Deep-X "Explorer", manufactured by Uulshos Manufacturing and modified by the techs of Fizzi's Slightly Used Starships.

The Wild Star was a Dpx yacht of the Deep-X "Explorer" variant that was equipped with a dual hyperdrive, two blaster cannons, and starfighter-level ion engines. Garginoolaara, the chief technician at Fizzi's Slightly Used Starships, replaced the already powerful engines with a Boshaa-C'hi Ion Drive and pushed these beyond their limits. This made the Wild Star a ship purely built for speed.
The Wild Star was put on sale at Fizzi's Slightly Used Ships for  95,000.
